item.title: Privacy Frontends on Odyssey346.dev
item.description: Privacy and bandwidth are important. This is true. All those services like YouTube load an insane amount of bloat in your browser. All you want to do is watch a YouTube video? Enjoy like 10MB of JS, HTML, tracking etc. You agree that sucks, right? Well, you have Invidious and Piped, which let you watch YouTube videos, without all the tracking and bloat. Same applies to Reddit, which has a privacy frontend called Libreddit.
